channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#1718; 08:26PM; 888 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uNE6YV; Downtown; Firefighters extinguished 3 fully involved autos and completed searches to ensure no victims inside. The final auto is an electric vehicle which will take copious amounts of water to extinguish. No further details and no further updates anticipated. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA209 RA810 SQ21 T10 T9; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1718; 07:58PM; 888 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uNE6YV; Downtown; Five story parking structure with multiple autos on fire on the 4th floor. While firefighters are making good progress, one of the vehicles is an electric car which will require a longer operation to safely extinguish it. No injuries reported.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA209 RA810 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1383; 06:47PM; 10925 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1gcc1; Vermont Vista; At 4:54PM firefighters responded to a reported structure fire. A small restaurant (approx 25' x 15') had an outside cooking area where the fire started and extended into a portion of the restaurant which sustained significant damage. Firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes. A 50 yo male patient sustained burn injuries to his arm when trying to extinguish the fire. He was transported to the hospital in fair condition. LA County Dept of Health notified per protocol for fire in a restaurant. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 FR64 RA64 RA864 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0680; 11:10AM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; Panorama City; Patient Update: 64 yo male transported to the hospital in fair condition with smoke inhalation only (no burns as originally believed). There are no other patients or injuries reported. ; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR1 AR34 AR7 BC10 BC12 CM40 CM42 E102 E275 E288 E290 E7 E81 E90 EM12 PI2 PI4 RA7 RA73 RA75 RA77 RA81 RA88 SO1 T75 T88 T90; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - with injury 12/08/2023 INC#0680

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - with injury; INC#0680; 10:44AM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; Panorama City; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished fire in the laundry room on the 3rd floor in 21 minutes . Firefighters located and pulled one patient off of the fire floor. The patient has burn injuries and is being assessed by firefighter/paramedics, condition currently unknown. Firefighters are checking each unit on the floor to ensure no other occupants need assistance, there were several sheltering in place during the fire.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 CM40 CM42 E102 E275 E288 E290 E7 E81 E90 RA7 RA75 RA81 RA88 SO1 T75 T88 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0680; 10:23AM; 8525 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJPLKe; Panorama City; Four story (3 residential over parking) garden style apartment building with fire and smoke showing from one unit on the 3rd (top floor). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E288 E290 E7 E81 E90 RA75 RA88 T88 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1416; 07:18PM; 12970 W Branford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dE6qo4; Pacoima; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving units made an offensive fire attack and located a contents fire within one unit, extinguishing it in 23 minutes with no injuries reported.. They prevented the fire from extending into the adjacent units (smoke only). Additional resources are canceled. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E275 E289 E290 E7 E81 E87 E89 E95 E98 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA839 RA98 SQ87 SQ95 T27 T60 T75 T89 T90 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 14 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1416; 06:55PM; 12970 W Branford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dE6qo4; Pacoima; Large commercial building with moderate smoke showing from one unit. Additional resources enroute. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E275 E289 E290 E7 E81 E87 E89 E95 E98 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA839 RA98 SQ87 SQ95 T27 T60 T75 T89 T90 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0562; 10:34AM; 348 N Kenter Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sYiHMh; Brentwood; Firefighters extricated the trapped driver (adult female does not appear to have life-threating injuries). It was a single car which rolled down from their driveway up the hill. The car is stable in the backyard and there is no damage to the structure. Removing the vehicle will be an extensive operation and firefighters are evaluating the situation for options. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E237 E37 E59 EM9 HR3 RA19 RA71 T37 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0562; 10:20AM; 348 N Kenter Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sYiHMh; Brentwood; One vehicle into a backyard (initial reports of rolling down into backyard) with one person trapped. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E237 E37 E59 EM9 HR3 RA19 RA71 T37 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart
